settings.announcement_bar_text: Fast & Free Shipping on ALL Orders!
settings.second_announcement_bar_text: Fast & Free Shipping on ALL Orders!

settings.text: We keep it simple: meticulously committed to providing you with a shopping experience that never compromises quality or value. You get both every time. It's uncomplicated, it's generous, and it's our honest promise!

settings.title: BCP Blog
settings.description:
Become an expert on finely crafted items & get exclusive
content written by our experts in-house.

settings.text: At Best Choice Products, we're here to change how you shop. Defined by our products, motivated by customers, and devoted to savings; we're re-inventing the world of online retail. We keep it simple: meticulously committed to providing you with a shopping experience that never compromises quality or value. You get both every time. It's uncomplicated, it's generous, and it's our honest promise

settings.body_text: Unlike other product-based companies, we are industry experts. Our very center is all about the passion we have in creating our products. We take pride in our diverse categories and selections. By keeping our entire process in-house, we’re able to design and build products we know you’ll love. Every BCP team member listens to you and your needs through market insight and research.

Behind every category are  Product Developers who work with our Sourcing Team to make sure every item that wants to be listed on BCP has both quality and value. With over 16 years of partnerships with our global partners, we’re still one of the most trusted companies to work with. Our Sourcing and Product Development teams help us manufacture items at unbelievable prices.

settings.text: Part of being dedicated is helping you in real time. We’ve invested in 24/7 live chat and email.
Self-support is available when you’d like to track your order or find helpful tips & tricks.
When you need us, call us! Our customer support reps are trained product & case specialists.

settings.title: Here for Our Customers
settings.intro:
Our customers really make BCP. Your voice lets us know where to start. We do whatever it takes to get to know you better: surveys, reviews, and overall trend analysis.
When you let us know what you like, we can build more of what you want, and none of what you don’t.

settings.overlay_text: At BCP, it’s all about quality and value.

settings.text: No matter who or what you’re shopping for, you can find it with us at Best Choice Products. We keep things simple, so shopping becomes fun again. From our warehouses to management, we remain committed to providing both quality and value on all our products. No gimmicks, just our promise to the most important person in this process, you.

settings.title: Image with text overlay
settings.text: Use overlay text to give your customers insight into your brand. Select imagery and text that relates to your style and story.
We live and breathe quality products.
We make everything for our customers.
We create affordable prices that disrupt the market.

settings.title: Who We Are
settings.intro:
We bring our customers elevated products at affordable prices, never sacrificing one for the other.
By staying dedicated to who we are, we infinitely make this mission a reality.

settings.quote: "From my first day of work, I felt like I was already part of a family. There’s a sense of pride in working for a company that values your ideas and focuses on innovation and growth."

"I feel like I’m part of a growing movement focused on satisfying our customers with great products at amazing prices. BCP’s positive and energetic culture makes it easy to be excited to come to work."
"BCP always looks for the next innovative product to bring to our customers. With a value to be infinite in what we do, the energetic culture makes for an enjoyable work day, every day."
settings.employee: Linda Nespole - Director of Human Resources

settings.quote: The culture and environment at BCP are second to none. Being an employee who made the jump from customer service rep to marketing; I’m a prime example of how awesome the opportunity for growth is."

settings.heading: Marketing
settings.text: Our most diversely intertwined department, Marketing makes sure our brand is always on track by handling sales data and producing social media and creative content. This team makes sure our brand is always on track.

settings.heading: Customer Experience
settings.text: Part of listening to our customers is making sure we’re always available, which is why everyday communication is important. BCP’s first voice does that for our customers.

settings.heading: Category Management
settings.text: Our diverse catalog starts with our leaders in category management. They play a huge role in creating products based on input from our customers’ needs and requests.

settings.heading: Operations
settings.text: As part of Operations, our warehouses all over the country are in-sync to make sure orders are fulfilled and safely arrive to our customer’s door.

settings.heading: Purchasing
settings.text: Our purchasing team builds and maintains partnerships with our manufacturers all over the world. They meticulously ensure all our products carry quality and design, always.

settings.heading: Information Technology
settings.text: The heroes behind the curtain are our tech-savvy geniuses. From coding to creation, IT makes sure our customers enjoy the BCP experience without any glitches.

settings.heading: Medical Plan
settings.text: We take care of our employees. Enjoy medical benefits, including vision, dental, and life coverage.

settings.heading: 401K Package
settings.text: We invest in you & your future. We offer a comprehensive 401k plan that prepares you for retirement.

settings.heading: Employee Assistance
settings.text: When you need an ear, counseling services are made available to you 24/7.

settings.heading: Social Events
settings.text: Don’t expect boring with BCP! Celebrate birthdays, come to the ball game, and other team outings.

settings.heading: Paid Vacation & Holidays
settings.text: You’ll be working hard on a regular basis, and we make sure to take well deserved breaks!

settings.heading: Employee Discounts
settings.text: Our customers enjoy the best prices in quality products. Employees get that too!

settings.heading: On-Site Gym
settings.text: Healthy bodies and minds lead to a happy workplace! Enjoy a workout in our on-site gym.

settings.heading: Arcade Room
settings.text: Give your mind a break or wake up from a lunch food coma with an array of games, including ping-pong, pool, or foosball!

settings.heading: Free Snacks
settings.text: Fuel up with snacks and beverages, from classic favorites to hearty options. Plus, all the coffee you need.

settings.title: Job Opportunities
settings.sub_title_career:
We're always looking toward building a bigger, better BCP!
Interested in joining us? Check out all our career opportunities through Indeed!

settings.overlay_text: Meticulously committed to providing both quality & value in every item we build for you.

settings.quote: "We received an amazing coffee table set from @bcproducts & it really completes our living room. 😍 The prices are amazing, the shipping is fast & putting it together was quick!"
settings.author: @babybumpsandmombuns_

settings.quote: Loving our new recliner! @bcproducts offers great prices. I love making our house a home and they make it so affordable.
settings.author: @lakishafranklin5.0

settings.quote: "Best Choice Products is where I’ll be shopping for toys and gifts until the end of time. They have the best quality with affordable pricing, and the customer service is EVERYTHING!"
settings.author: @brittfusilier

settings.quote: "Best Choice Products  has the best customer service, affordable prices, and a huge selection of stuff for the home and kids!
settings.author: @teeenzy

settings.title: #mybcp Moments
settings.message: Share your picture-perfect savings. Get inspired & Shop our Instagram.

settings.overlay_text:
The possibilities at BCP are endless, and
we’d love to have you on board.

settings.new_text: Get a new deal each day! Selected from categories, gift guides, or our favorites list, deals will have exclusive pricing and a discount code to make sure you get the best savings online. Check back with us everyday to reveal new, jaw-dropping deals along with new codes that help you save big! Enter a code at checkout through 11:59 PM PST November 27th or while supplies last.

settings.cyber_main_text_bf: These offers are valid for a limited time. Shop Now!

settings.cyber_chri_onetext:
We want to see how you use our seasonal items to create a contemporary holiday look! Get creative with our Christmas trees and winter holiday decor while unleashing your inner photographer. Feature our product in your photo and attach it to a review on the item’s bestchoiceproducts.com product page. 

 Don’t forget to tag #BCPHolidays in the review so we can find your submission.

10 winners will be selected and receive a BCP credit ranging from $100 up to $1,000! Consecutive winners will win $900, $800, until the 10th place winner at $100.

settings.cyber_chri_two_text:
<li>Contiguous US only</li>
<li>Any photo submitted in review will subject to Best Choice Products’ Review terms & conditions.</li>
<li>To be eligible you must complete a review with a photo of your seasonal décor item on BestChoiceProducts.com. Between the dates of 12/4/19-12/12/19 11:59 PM PST. Review must include #BCPHolidays</li>
<li>Must be submitted with a valid email address</li>
<li>No cash value </li>

settings.cyber_chri_firstonetext:
1. Leave a review with a photo on a seasonal holiday item purchased in 2019. 

• Use the same email address you purchased the item with! 
• Include the hashtag #BCPHolidays in the review's body. 

2. Confirm your review submission in the confirmation email. 

3. Review must be submitted by December 12, 2019.

settings.cyber_chri_second_onetext:
Q: I already left a review with or without a photo. What do I do? 
A: Leave another following the criteria above! 

Q: I didn't get the review confirmation email. 
A: You must click the confirm button in our email to enter. Make sure you check your spam.

Q: Do I also get the reward points for leaving a review? 
A: If you're leaving a review with the same email address your rewards account uses, you will get 50 reward points! 

Q: Does it have to be a 5-star review? 
A: No! We use customer reviews to constantly improve our products. Your honest feedback helps us do that. 

Q: I purchased multiple applicable products. Can I leave a review for each one?
A: Yes, however you can only review a product once and you can only win one of the ten prizes.

settings.bg_text_about_us: Together with customers, our mission is to create the internet’s most popular products.

settings.about_image_body: Taking customer favorite products online and re-inventing them with useful solutions.
Always using surveys and customer feedback; we validate the product’s design & solutions.
When the product comes to life, value + quality are meticulously checked!
Our in-house creative and merchandising teams prepare the product for launch.

settings.text_about_us_two:
We start by developing products with elevated
features you’ll value.

settings.our_header_about_us_third: We do everything ourselves to make our products the most affordable on the market.
settings.our_sub_header_about_us_third: We partner with the best manufacturers from around the globe who bring our products to you at a reasonable cost, but everything else is done internally:

settings.ab_fourth_body: To create products that are truly customer approved, we designed a program where real customers can share their ideas with us and even test new products for themselves.
To make sure you’re always satisfied while shopping with us, we've assembled teams for product support and 24/7 customer support, available via chat, email & phone.

settings.title_about_us_fourth: We Treat Quality & Customer Satisfaction as One

settings.about_fifth_sub_header: " BCP has great quality products for a reasonable price. Their customer service is very responsive and helpful. Definitely recommend! "
" Unbelievable Quality! Unbelievable Service. Best Prices! I’m never disappointed with BCP. Quality is so much better than others I Considered buying. Believe it! "

settings.sub_text_about_us_seven: No matter who or what you’re shopping for, you can find it with us at Best Choice Products. From fulfillment centers up to management, we are dedicated to providing elevated features & value pricing in all our products. No gimmicks, just our promise to the most important person in this process, you.

settings.i_message: Shop Here to Save the Time & Stress!

settings.three_promo_subheader: Add all of your favorite BCP items to your shopping cart.
Select ‘Afterpay Installments’ as your payment method at checkout.

Create an account or log in to an existing Afterpay account.
No Credit Checks & Instant Approval!
Place order! Orders will be split into 4 equal payments, payable every 2 weeks.

settings.after_shipping_answer:
Installments with Afterpay is a service that allows you to make purchases now and pay for them in four payments made every 2 weeks without any interest.


Shop BCP and checkout as usual. At checkout, choose Afterpay as your payment method. You will be directed to the Afterpay website to register and provide payment details (Visa, Mastercard, or AMEX).

If you’ve used Afterpay before, just log into your Afterpay account and complete your order -- it’s that simple! Please note, all items in your shopping bag must be eligible for Afterpay, and the order value must be between $1 and $10,000.

For more information, visit Afterpay’s FAQ page. If you have a question about your Afterpay account, please contact the Afterpay toll-free Customer Support line at 855-289-6014 or submit a question Here.

settings.after_shipping_question: How do I use Installments with Afterpay?
settings.after_shipping_answer: Simply add items to your shopping cart and checkout as normal. At the checkout choose Installments with Afterpay as your payment method. First-time customers will need to register with Afterpay and provide payment details, as usual, returning customers simply log in to make their purchase. It’s that easy!  Please note that all items in your shopping bag must be eligible for Installments with Afterpay. A minimum purchase amount may apply and you must meet additional eligibility requirements to qualify.

settings.after_shipping_question: Where can I use Installments with Afterpay?
settings.after_shipping_answer: Installments with Afterpay can now be applied to purchases made on the BCP website.

settings.after_shipping_question: Can I use Installments with Afterpay if I’m an international customer?
settings.after_shipping_answer:
Afterpay is only offered to our customers who have a US billing address, US shipping address, a US Visa or Mastercard (credit or debit card), or American Express and a US mobile phone number. Customers with international billing addresses, shipping addresses, and/or phone numbers will not be able to set up an account with Afterpay.


Best Choice Products only ships to the 48 contiguous states. We currently do not ship to Hawaii, Alaska, Puerto Rico, or Guam. We also do not ship to FPO, APO, or PO Boxes.

settings.after_shipping_question: How does the payment schedule work?
settings.after_shipping_answer: All customers are required to make their first payment at the time of purchase, with the remaining three payments deducted every two weeks from your chosen payment method. If you choose to make additional payments before your scheduled pay dates, you may do so through your Afterpay account.  You can log in to your Afterpay account to view your payment schedule and make a payment before the due date if you choose to do so.

settings.after_shipping_question: Where can I find common questions about payments?
When will my items be delivered if I use Installments with Afterpay?
settings.after_shipping_answer: Afterpay orders are delivered as per our standard shipping time frame after you complete your order online. Visit our shipping page for more information by clicking here.

settings.after_shipping_question: Is there a limit to how much I can spend on a single transaction?
settings.after_shipping_answer: Yes, transaction value limits apply to purchases made on bestchoiceproducts.com using Installments by Afterpay.  All items in your shopping bag must be eligible for Afterpay, and the order value must be between $1 and $10,000.

settings.after_shipping_question: How do I return or exchange an item purchased using Installments with Afterpay?
settings.after_shipping_answer:
If you have changed your mind, you can return your Afterpay purchase for a refund. To Return an item purchased on bestchoiceproducts.com, please contact BCP Customer Support here.
Afterpay will be notified of your return and will process the appropriate refunds. Please do not return your purchase to Afterpay. If you believe there is fault or concern with your Afterpay purchase payment, please contact Afterpay customer support at info@afterpay.com

settings.after_shipping_question: What if I can’t pay an Afterpay installment?
settings.after_shipping_answer: If funds are not available or you otherwise do not make your payment when it is due, late fees may apply. Click here for complete terms.

settings.after_shipping_question: What happens if I have a partial refund, and how does that affect my payments?
settings.after_shipping_answer: Afterpay will be notified once your refund is processed. Your payment plan will be automatically adjusted to reflect the new total order value starting with the last payment and working backward. In the case where a refund amount is larger than 25% of the total order, Afterpay will eliminate the fourth installment payment and apply the remaining amount to your earlier payments.

settings.after_shipping_question: Where can I find out more about Afterpay?
settings.after_shipping_answer:
Installments with Afterpay is a service that allows you to make purchases now and pay for them in four payments made every 2 weeks without any interest.


Shop BCP and checkout as usual. At checkout, choose Afterpay as your payment method. You will be directed to the Afterpay website to register and provide payment details (Visa, Mastercard, or AMEX).

If you’ve used Afterpay before, just log into your Afterpay account and complete your order -- it’s that simple! Please note, all items in your shopping bag must be eligible for Afterpay, and the order value must be between $1 and $10,000.

For more information, visit Afterpay’s FAQ page. If you have a question about your Afterpay account, please contact the Afterpay toll-free Customer Support line at 855-289-6014 or submit a question here.

settings.amb_second_sub_text: Best Choice Products is proud to share a program where the gap between brand and customer is finally connected! We built this program in pursuit of our mission to include customers when developing best-sellers. This is an exclusive, invite-only program. It’s the perfect program for those who regularly shop at BCP and leave us valuable feedback through reviews. In joining this program, you’ll continue your status as a valued customer, but also provide us with your insights on future BCP best-sellers!

settings.amb_promo_subheader: Be the first to experience new releases in the comfort of your home.
Enjoy amplified savings as an ambassador and VIP customer!
We’ll hop on a zoom call with you to talk product; give us your two cents.

settings.amb_promo_subtitle: We Match Your Efforts with Perks & Benefits!

settings.amb_shipping_answer: Yes! This program is exclusively designed for customers who meet qualifications.
Based on the category the customers shop from the most, our team will create an internal list of products from that category that customers can review.

settings.amb_shipping_question: Do members have to pay a fee?
settings.amb_shipping_answer: Absolutely not! Everything from being part of the program to the products the customers receive are all without a cost to them.
Our ambassador program is a repetitive program that will run all year long with different campaigns each month.

settings.amb_last_section: Are you the innovator amongst friends? If you’re interested in using your voice to represent thousands of BCP customers, click the link below to see if you qualify to be a Product Journey Ambassador!

settings.about_second_text: Our Mission is to provide Best Sellers on the Internet
settings.about_second_sub_text: We're bringing elevated features to your home and family with every product, carefully curated with the help of our customers and the product development process!
